name: developer-bot

examples.text: I have a bug in the code
What did I do today with the chatbot?
Provide me with the day's summary
I don't know what to do!
I am stuck at this point!
I don't have sufficient time to implement this!
can you deploy application for me?
Do I have any emails from my manager?
Could you check the news for me?
What is happening around the world?
what are my tasks for today
I want to be more productive
I want to list tasks for the day

description: A workspace for chatbot aiding developers with daily tasks

In Java, Strings are immutable

LinkedList is fast for adding and deleting elements, but slow to access a specific element. ArrayList is fast for accessing a specific element but can be slow to add to either end, and especially slow to delete in the middle. So use appropriate list based on whether you need to primarily read from the list or make updates to it.
